name: Fragile Horse
description:
Fragile Horse is an aesthetic game providing sensory stimulation through an attractive ethereal environment. Guide the fragile glass horse and leap through this infinite physics game that anyone can play. Aim for the platforms and target collectibles to unlock more content and ethereal weather

Features:

creative graphics and mellow but captivating gameplay to exhilarate players while they relax.
provides sensory stimulation and rare dynamic gameplay
attractive collectibles, fragile platforms, infinite play
aesthetic scenery and artwork
